Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that CNN says there are false COVID-19 cases in Nigeria, when in fact, there is no evidence or mention of this in any CNN report.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to validate the statement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there are indeed COVID-19 cases in Nigeria, as confirmed by the country's center for disease control.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Nigerian government is deliberately falsifying COVID-19 cases for personal gain, without providing any evidence or justification for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the image and false claim were created and spread with the intention of spreading misinformation or causing panic.
